items.headline: U.S. stock futures flat after Friday’s record highs, as ‘market has learned to thrive in ambiguity’
items.summary_en: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed on Sunday, after the three major indexes all closed at record highs on Friday.

items.headline: Social Security is on track to be insolvent in less than 10 years — but its commissioner says there’s ‘plenty of time’ to find a solution

items.headline: Are your parents afraid of investing in crypto? How to talk with them so they’ll actually listen.
